name: SUNDOWN (LaG, Zacosk, The Fridge 2099, 0Booknerd0, Alipton)
description:
“A walk through someone’s yesterday before it’s no more”

“Sundown” is an experience where you are positioned to inhabit the life of Ruth, a 68-year-old science lecturer who is trying to remember, but can not. As Ruth, you will undergo struggles not just of the body, but of the mind, as you traverse a reality that is devolving around you. Among the confusion, the anxiety, the fear, you will need to find your way back to your reality.

However, a question remains: Is it possible to make it out of the labyrinth of the mind after the sun goes down? Explore the home.

Find what has been forgotten.


Created for 81532 Creative Intelligence Capstone (2022)
